title: MLG Blockchain Consulting Appoints Renowned Blockchain Engineer Suman Das as CTO

organizations.name: cto global blockchain firm welcomes blockchain engineering authority

text:
Global Blockchain Firm Welcomes Blockchain Engineering Authority to Growing Consultancy
TORONTO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- MLG Blockchain Consulting is pleased to announce the addition of Suman Das as Chief Technology Officer for the growing global enterprise blockchain consulting and development firm. Suman has 15 years of experience in software application development that includes 8 years as an entrepreneur and founder of the Excoflare software development company.
Founder and CEO of MLG Blockchain Consulting, Michael Gord says, “We’re very pleased to have Suman join our team, and know that his deep understanding of software development, Blockchain technology and scaling production applications will help our clients and product development efforts as we continue to experience immense growth across the globe.”
Suman previously worked as CTO for Unocoin, a leading Bitcoin company in India. In the past, Suman was associated with Paypal and Yahoo as a software developer. He has deep working experience with a wide range of programming languages and platforms including C++, GoLang, Android, IOS, PHP, Perl, Java, Symbian and Tcl-Tk. Blockchain and cryptocurrency are his main interests for the past 5 years, and he’s provided his expert skills to various crypto and blockchain startups.
“With the crypto and Blockchain industries evolving at the speed of light, I’m honored to be joining the global MLG team to help our clients get a comprehensive understanding of this complex technology ecosystem,” said Suman Das.
Suman has a Bachelor of Science from Guwahati University and A-Level Computer Science Diploma from NIELIT/DOEACC. He considers himself a self-taught programmer, and credits Google for his ongoing success.
About MLG Blockchain Consulting
MLG Blockchain is a global blockchain development and consulting firm headquartered in Toronto with a distributed team across North America, Europe and Asia that is focused on building next-generation applications using blockchain and smart contract technology. MLG Blockchain speeds up its clients understanding and potential opportunities for and implementation of blockchain technology.
For more information, please visit mlgblockchain.com , or follow @MLGBlockchain on Twitter and Facebook.
